block_like_description:
Define the limit of how many liked people can be displayed in Pages detail page.
0 means doesn't show this block.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_pag: Are you sure you want to delete this page permanently?
block_admin_description: Enable this option to show the page admins within a block when viewing a page. The person who created the page will be listed as the "Founder".
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_cat: Are you sure you want to delete this category image?
integrate_module_description: Select Yes to integrate {module} with Page. No to turn it off and users could not perform any action on {module} in page detail.
block_category_cache_time_description: Define how long we should keep the cache for the Pages Category by minutes. 0 means we do not cache data for this block.
seo_pages_meta_description: create your page to connect people
your_claim_has_been_denied: Your claim at page {page} has been denied by {moderator}.
your_claim_has_been_approved: Your claim has been approved by {moderator}. You has been set to be owner of {page}.
you_has_been_removed_as_owner_of_page: You has been removed as owner of page {page} by {moderator}.
full_name_post_some_images_on_your_page_: {full_name} posted some images on your page {title}
{full_name} posted some images on your page "{title}". To see the image, follow the link below: {link}
full_name_post_some_images_on_page_title: {full_name} posted some images on page "{title}". To see the image, follow the link below: {link}
full_name_tagged_you_in_a_post_in_page_t: {full_name} tagged you in a post in page {title}.
full_name_tagged_you_in_a_comment_in_pag: {full_name} tagged you in a comment in page {title}.
block_people_also_like_description:
Define the limit of how many pages can be displayed in block People also like.
0 means doesn't show this block.
we_do_not_support_javascript_in_widgets_: We do not support javascript in widget's content. It will be automatically removed.
full_name_wrote_a_comment_on_page_link: {full_name} wrote a comment on page "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
full_name_posted_a_link_on_your_page_tit: {full_name} posted a link on your page "{title}".
full_name_posted_a_link_on_page_link: {full_name} posted a link on page "{title}". To see the link, follow the link below: {link}
full_name_posted_a_link_on_your_page_lin: {full_name} posted a link on your page "{title}". To see the link, follow the link below: {link}
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_use: Are you sure you want to delete this user from the page?
remove_all_pages_and_sub_categories_belo: Remove all pages and sub-categories belonging to this category
remove_all_pages_belonging_to_this_categ: Remove all pages belonging to this category
select_another_category_to_move_all_page: Select another category to move all pages and sub-categories belonging to this category
Select another category to move all pages belonging to this category
validation_pages_limit_per_category_phra: Pages Limit Per Category must greater or equal 0 and must be an integer.
validation_max_upload_size_pages_phrase: Max file size for photos upload must be greater or equal 0 and must be an integer.
validation_points_pages_phrase: Activity points received when creating a new page must greater or equal 0 and must be an integer.
validation_flood_control_phrase: "Flood control time" must greater or equal 0 and must be an integer.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_admin_ro: Are you sure you want to remove admin role from this user?
